response.overview: A young group of typical, everyday teenagers are nearing another high school weeks end.  One teen by the name of Tyler BaRamus (TYLER DERAMUS), is throwing a party that Friday night.  He has invited his best friend Barren Williams (DARREN WILLIAMS) and his secret crush Teather Ranger (HEATHER GRANGER).  She brings along her best friend Stephen Nichael (STEPHEN CLARK).  What seemed to be just a normal night of partying turns grim when the host Tyler BaRamus goes missing after leaving the room in which they were all playing a drinking game inside.  From this event on out, Kidnapped takes you on a wild, horrific, and suspenseful roller coaster ride all the way to the very end -
response.title: Kidnapped
